pr_title: [#9536] Instructor Course Student Details Page E2E Test

timeline.bodyText: While this works, is there a better reader-friendly way to indicate what this means? e.g. asserting that the text content is "Not Specified", while slightly more prone to change, is closer to being a black box and also more reader-friendly.
timeline.author: wkurniawan07

timeline.message: Check for text instead of not-specified element
